job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Title: Data ScientistLocation: Dallas, TX or Atlanta, GA (Post Covid)-remote for nowType: Contract & FulltimeJob Description:1.	A data scientist for the ML program of AIOps, which uses the FB Prophet forecasting algorithm.2.	The staff will be involved in analysis of time series data, root cause analysis of anomaly data, maintenance and enhancement of the forecasting techniques as well.3.	As Prophet is not a typical anomaly detection model, this isn’t giving us the insightful recommendations we need to avoid/ minimize outages- so the expectation is also to be able to propose alternate / improved techniques during the course of regular implementation so that this helps to strengthen our footprint on this trackInterested please share your updated resume to kishore@kbs-s.comBest RegardsKishore
